title: COAST ORB / seagull
description: There is a seagull flying somewhere along the coast. The area there should have an afterthought orbital.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "You see that seagull up there? Remi..."
dialogueTree.english: You see that seagull up there? Remind you of anybody?
dialogueTree.polish: Widzisz tę mewę tam, na górze? Przypomina ci kogoś?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Відзіш гэту чайку там, наверсе? Яна нагадвае табе каго-небудзь?

links.title: You: "No one comes to mind."
links.english: No one comes to mind.
links.polish: Nikt mi nie przychodzi do głowy.
links.belarusian: Ніхто не прыходзіць мне на думку.

links.title: Endurance: "You! You and the seagull are just a..."
links.english: You! You and the seagull are just alike!
links.polish: Ciebie! Ty i mewa jesteście tacy sami!
links.belarusian: Цябе! Ты і чайка аднолькавыя!

links.title: You: "Why am I like a seagull?"
links.english: Why am I like a seagull?
links.polish: Czemu jestem jak mewa?
links.belarusian: Чаму я як чайка?

links.title: Endurance: "Think about the seagull's story. It..."
links.english: Think about the seagull's story. It's one of endurance -- and adaptation. The seaside was paradise once. They were birds of that paradise.
links.polish: Pomyśl sobie o jej historii. To opowieść o wytrzymałości i adaptacji. Wybrzeże było niegdyś rajem. Mewy zaś – rajskimi ptakami.
links.belarusian: Падумай пра яе гісторыю. Гэта аповед пра вытрымку і адаптацыю. Узбярэжжа калісьці было раем. А чайкі — раскошнымі птушкамі.

links.title: Endurance: "Then their paradise became *shit ci..."
links.english: Then their paradise became *shit city*. And what did they do? They became urban survivors! Eating burgers out of trash cans! Killing and eating pigeons!
links.polish: A potem ich raj zmienił się w *gówniane zadupie*. I co zrobiły? Trwają w tym mieście dalej! Wyjadają burgery ze śmietników! Zabijają i pożerają gołębie!
links.belarusian: А потым іх рай ператварыўся ў *сранае паселішча*. І што яны зрабілі? Застаюцца ў гэтым горадзе далей! Выядаюць гамбургеры з смеццевых бакоў! Забіваюць і пажыраюць галубоў!

links.title: Endurance: "No time for that sentimental bullsh..."
links.english: No time for that sentimental bullshit. They're hustlers, getting shit done. They're one pair of track pants away from gangsters. Just like you.
links.polish: Nie czas na te sentymentalne bzdety. To cwane bestie robiące, co do nich należy. Od gangsterów różni je tylko brak dresowych spodni. Tak jak i ciebie.
links.belarusian: Не час для гэтых сентыментальных глупстваў. Гэта хітрыя стварэнні, якія робяць тое, што павінны. Ад гангстараў іх адрознівае толькі адсутнасць спартовых штаноў. Як і цябе.

links.title: You: "Hold on. Have I ever eaten a burger..."
links.english: Hold on. Have I ever eaten a burger out of the trash?
links.polish: Zaraz. Czy ja zjadłem kiedyś burgera ze śmietnika?
links.belarusian: Зараз. Ці я калі-небудзь з'еў бургер са сметніка?

links.title: Endurance: "You have. The body remembers."
links.english: You have. The body remembers.
links.polish: Tak. Twoje ciało to pamięta.
links.belarusian: Так. Тваё цела гэта памятае.

links.title: You: "Fuckin' right. Whatever it takes to..."
links.english: Fuckin' right. Whatever it takes to survive. I AM THE SEAGULL!
links.polish: Tak jest, kurwa. Zrobię wszystko, co niezbędne, żeby przeżyć. JESTEM MEWĄ!!!
links.belarusian: Так, блін. Зраблю ўсё неабходнае, каб выжыць. Я ЧАЙКА!!!

links.title: Endurance: "Own it! Steal hot dogs, shit in the..."
links.english: Own it! Steal hot dogs, shit in the sand -- whatever it takes to keep going!
links.polish: Pogódź się z tym! Kradnij hot dogi, sraj w piach. Rób wszystko, byle przeć dalej!
links.belarusian: Прымаірся з гэтым! Красці хот-догі, гарлаць у пясок. Рабі ўсё, каб толькі ісці далей!

links.title: You: "I guess I *am* a bit like the seagu..."
links.english: I guess I *am* a bit like the seagull.
links.polish: No to chyba *faktycznie* jestem trochę jak mewa.
links.belarusian: Дык, напэўна, *сапраўды* я крыху як чайка.

links.title: Endurance: "Exactly. The seagull does what it t..."
links.english: Exactly. The seagull does what it takes -- and so do you. You've got that same spirit in you. When the time comes, you'll push yourself.
links.polish: Dokładnie. Mewa robi to, co musi. Tak jak i ty. Drzemie w was taki sam duch. Kiedy nadejdzie czas, dasz z siebie wszystko.
links.belarusian: Дакладна. Чайка робіць тое, што мусіць. Як і ты. Сьпіць у вас такі ж дух. Калі прыйдзе час, дашь з сябе ўсё.

links.title: You: "But I'm not like that! I'm still ro..."
links.english: But I'm not like that! I'm still romantic.
links.polish: Ale ja taki nie jestem! Wciąż jestem romantykiem.
links.belarusian: Але ж я не такі! Я ўсё яшчэ рамантык.

links.title: Endurance: "Sure, *inside*. But outside it's a..."
links.english: Sure, *inside*. But outside it's a tough world. You've got to do whatever it takes to survive. And you *do*. Question is: will you admit that to yourself?
links.polish: Jasne, *w głębi serca*. Ale zewnętrzny świat jest bezlitosny. Musisz robić wszystko, żeby przetrwać. I *robisz*. Pytanie brzmi: czy jesteś gotów się do tego przyznać?
links.belarusian: Вядома, *у глыбіні сэрца*. Але знешні свет бязлітасны. Ты павінен рабіць усё, каб выжыць. І *робіш*. Пытанне ў тым, ці гатовы ты ў гэтым прызнацца?

links.title: You: "Okay... well, let me re-consider."
links.english: Okay... well, let me re-consider.
links.polish: Dobra... No, pozwól mi jeszcze pomyśleć.
links.belarusian: Добра... Але дазволь мне яшчэ падумаць.

links.title: Endurance: "Good boy."
links.english: Good boy.
links.polish: Dobry chłopak.
links.belarusian: Добры хлопец.

links.title: You: "I will not, no. [Finish thought.]"
links.english: I will not, no. [Finish thought.]
links.polish: Nie jestem, nie. [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: Я не, не. [Сконч тыдзень].

links.title: You: "Um... me?"
links.english: Um... me?
links.polish: Eee... Mnie?
links.belarusian: Ээ... Мне?

links.title: Endurance: "Exactly!"
links.english: Exactly!
links.polish: Dokładnie!
links.belarusian: Дакладна!

links.title: You: "Kim?"
links.english: Kim?
links.polish: Kima?
links.belarusian: Кіма?

links.title: Endurance: "What? Kim? No, it's you! You! You a..."
links.english: What? Kim? No, it's you! You! You and the seagull are just alike!
links.polish: Co? Kima? Nie, to ty! Ty! Ty i mewa jesteście tacy sami!
links.belarusian: Што? Кіма? Не, гэта ты! Ты! Ты і чайка такія ж!

links.title: You: "I'm not going to have a seagull con..."
links.english: I'm not going to have a seagull conversation. [Finish thought.]
links.polish: Nie będę prowadził dyskusji o mewach. [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: Я не буду весці дыскусію пра чаек. [Завяршыць думку].
